description: black and white photograph; back view of white calla lily featuring blossom and part of stem; black background
image_copyright: © Robert Mapplethorpe %2F The Robert Mapplethorpe Foundation
provenance: The artist; given to Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis, 1988; Steven Andersen, until 2013; given to MIA.
text: Robert Mapplethorpe was one of the most famous photographers of the late 20th century. Though perhaps best known for his shocking, sexually-charged images, he had an exquisite sensibility for the beautiful. Near the end of his life, he entered into collaboration with Steve Anderson of Vermillion Editions Limited. Mapplethorpe supplied the present photographs to Anderson who used them as the basis for a photolithographic diptych published by Vermillion in 1988.
title: Calla Lily
